# 머릿말

```{r webr-preface}
library(tidyverse)
webr_preface <- read_rds("data/webr_preface.rds")

webr_preface_tbl <- tribble( ~"머릿말",
                             webr_preface)
webr_preface_tbl %>% 
  reactable::reactable()
```

# 목차 

```{r webr-toc}
library(collapsibleTree)

webr_toc_tbl  <-  read_rds(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/webr_toc_tbl.rds"))

# webr_toc_tbl %>% 
#   reactable::reactable()

collapsibleTree(webr_toc_tbl, 
                hierarchy  = c("subtitle", "subsubtitle"),
                root       = "웹R 통계분석",
                tooltip    = TRUE,
                attributes = "title",
                fill       = "#64ABC2",
                collapsed  = TRUE, 
                width      = 800,
                zoomable   = FALSE)
```

## 무료 이용가능한 웹R 서버 

1. 웹에서 하는  ggplot2
    - https://cardiomoon.shinyapps.io/ggplot2new/
2. 웹에서 하는 R 통계 4.0 무료버젼
    - https://cardiomoon.shinyapps.io/reg1
    - https://cardiomoon.shinyapps.io/reg2
    - https://cardiomoon.shinyapps.io/reg3
3. propensity score matching
    - https://cardiomoon.shinyapps.io/psmatching
4. 강의용 앱 : p값, 카이제곱분포, t분포
    - https://cardiomoon.shinyapps.io/ttest
5. 강의용앱 : 다중검정의 문제
    - https://cardiomoon.shinyapps.io/multiplicity
6. 샘플수의 계산
    - https://cardiomoon.shinyapps.io/sampleSize
